system.description:
You are not part of the fellowship, no matter how much you may wish to be. You have a mission, and working alongside them goes against that mission.

When something reminds you of your purpose, roll +Wisdom.

You do not need to roll this Move if you intend to betray them anyway.

Just before you betray the fellowship, temporarily or otherwise, replace this playbook with @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-pb-nemesis.Item.ODyO6u8Nzep81JNv]{The Nemesis}. Keep all the same options you picked, including your level and moves and stats, but use the text found on that playbook instead.

This Move cannot be Shared.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value:
You must erase a Bond you hold with the fellowship.

Or if you do not have a Wisdom stat, you will betray them at the earliest good opportunity for you to do so.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
You remain on their side, for now.
You must erase a Bond you hold with the fellowship. If you have no Bonds remaining, take the 6- result instead.

success.label: Success!
success.value: You remain on their side, for now.
